ideaDescription: NeuroPunk Games is revolutionizing the Web3 gaming landscape by merging psychedelic art and immersive gameplay with blockchain technology. Our platform offers a unique collection of games where players can experience mind-bending visual experiences while earning and trading NFTs. Each game features procedurally generated psychedelic environments, creating unique and unrepeatable gaming experiences. Players can collect rare psychedelic-themed NFTs, participate in community-driven game development, and earn cryptocurrency rewards through our play-to-earn mechanics. With a focus on creating transformative gaming experiences, NeuroPunk Games combines the freedom of decentralized technology with cutting-edge visual design to create a new paradigm in digital entertainment.
ideaLogo:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg width="200" height="60" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="psychedelicGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FF6B6B"/>
      <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#4ECDC4"/>
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#9B59B6"/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Abstract psychedelic shape behind text -->
  <path d="M30,30 Q60,5 90,30 T150,30" fill="none" stroke="url(#psychedelicGradient)" stroke-width="3">
    <animate attributeName="d" 
             dur="5s" 
             repeatCount="indefinite"
             values="M30,30 Q60,5 90,30 T150,30;
                     M30,35 Q60,15 90,25 T150,35;
                     M30,30 Q60,5 90,30 T150,30"/>
  </path>
  
  <!-- Company Name -->
  <text x="20" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="24" fill="#2C3E50">
    NeuroPunk
  </text>
  
  <!-- Games text with special effect -->
  <text x="140" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="24" fill="url(#psychedelicGradient)">
    Games
  </text>
</svg>
